workflow.display-name: Create temporary file in guest (with Linux permissions)
workflow.description: Create a temporary file in a guest virtual machine.

param.name: dirPath
param.description: The complete path to the directory in which to create the new file. If unset or an empty string, a guest-specific location will be used.

param.name: prefix
param.description: The prefix to be given to the new temporary file

param.name: suffix
param.description: The suffix to be given to the new temporary file

param.name: result
param.description: The absolute path of the temporary file that is created.
